verses.roman:
nagariyāke pāgala kaila sadā saṅkīrtana
rātre nidrā nāhi yāi, kari jāgaraṇa

synonyms: nagariyāke—all the citizens; pāgala—mad; kaila—He has made; sadā—always; saṅkīrtana—congregational chanting; rātre—at night; nidrā—sleep; nāhi yāi—we do not get; kari—observe; jāgaraṇa—wakefulness.
translation: " 'He has made all the people practically mad by always performing congregational chanting. At night we cannot get any sleep; we are always kept awake.
